version_description: إصلاح بعض المشاكل
إصلاح بعض المشاكل
Soon ISA, Retina Display Update, iPad Support.
Soon ISA, Retina Display Update, iPad Support.
* Comprehensive change in Al Mus'haf concept & design
* Comprehensive change in Al Mus'haf concept & design

•For iOS 7 users: now you can download full Mus'haf on the background

•Now you can start playing audio from the beginning of each Sura, not only from the page

•Now, click on the page thumb on notes and you will be redirected to its page

•Fixed error on page number; now it matches the pages in Mus'haf

•URL scheme (mushaf://) for developers

•Previous reported issues fixed

•For iOS 7 users: now you can download full Mus'haf on the background

•Now you can start playing audio from the beginning of each Sura, not only from the page

•Now, click on the page thumb on notes and you will be redirected to its page

•Fixed error on page number; now it matches the pages in Mus'haf

•URL scheme (mushaf://) for developers

•Previous reported issues fixed

* Bug fixes and general improvements
* Share Mus'haf text + photos
* Option for stop playing audio after Surah ends

* Bug fixes and general improvements
* Share Mus'haf text + photos
* Option for stop playing audio after Surah ends

- If you have old version of Mus'haf please delete it before install this one
- أذا كان لديك نسخة سابقة من تطبيق المصحف من فضلك احذفها قبل تثبيت هذا التحديث

* Bug fixes and general improvements
* Share Mus'haf text + photos
* Option for stop playing audio after Surah ends
* Changed all Mus'haf and made sure that page numbers are all correct

* Bug fixes and general improvements
* Share Mus'haf text + photos
* Option for stop playing audio after Surah ends
* Changed all Mus'haf and made sure that page numbers are all correct

* Fixed a couple bugs that broke saving of of bookmarks and notes

* General improvements on Mus'haf downloading

(We are sorry for all users who loses there bookmarks or notes we will not doing it again)
